1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image, but it still appears to be more than 1 meter away. Moving forward will bring the drone closer to the target.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image. It appears to be more than 1 meter away, so moving forward will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image, but it does not yet occupy 25-30% of the frame. Moving forward will bring the drone closer to the target.

4.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with visible texture and detail. No further movement is necessary.
